name: Neptune Quest
description:
Inspired by a quote from Megedimension Neptunia VII and the credits from Hyperdimension Neptunia V, this game takes place in the world of the original Dragon Quest game with all game mechanics intact - then changes gears at a certain unmissable point within the game.

This game was created using RPG Maker VX Ace.  Originally released in September 2019.

Please support the official games and franchises - Dragon Quest, Neptunia, and any other games that are showcased here.

Please feel free to offer constructive criticism, but keep in mind that the mechanics are set up the way they are to mimic the original Dragon Quest as closely as possible.

In addition, please be sure to comment on any bugs or glitches you may find so that I can track them down and fix them.
